Original Title: Gone With the Wind
Year: 1939
Duration: 238 min .
Country: United States
Directed by Victor Fleming, George Cukor, Sam Wood
Screenplay : Sidney Howard, Oliver H.P.Garrett, Ben Hecht, Jo Swerling, John Van Druten (Novel:Margaret Mitchell)
Music: Max Steiner
Photo: Ernest Haller
Starring: Vivien Leigh, Clark Gable, Olivia de Havilland, Leslie Howard, Hattie McDaniel, Thomas Mitchell, Barbara O'Neil, Butterfly McQueen, Ona Munson, Ann Rutherford, Evelyn Keyes, Mickey Kuhn
Company: Selznick International Pictures/Metro-Goldwyn Mayer (MGM)
Genre: Drama.Romance.Adventure|Civil War.Nineteenth Century.Romantic Drama.Southern Drama

Synopsis:
---------
Georgia, 1861.Southern mansion in the well of Tara, Scarlett lives O'Hara (Vivien Leigh), most beautiful, whimsical and selfish young region.She longs for the love of Ashley (Leslie Howard), but he is engaged to his cousin, the sweet and kindly Melanie (Olivia de Havilland).At the last party before the outbreak of the Civil War (1861-1865), Scarlett cynic knows the handsome Rhett Butler ( Clark Gable), an arrogant playboy and adventurer, who thinks only of himself and has no intention of participate in the contest.All he wants is to get rich and win the heart of beautiful Scarlett.
